page.title: 17Leisure Activity (Cont.)
page.content:
There are many courses around with humps and jumps but they are quite dangerous.On the bike itself there are three safety pads to prevent injury. Different parts can be changed like the seat,brakes,frame,handlebars and wheels.Instead of doing stunts you can do simple riding around the streets.
{OTHER LEISURE ACTIVITIES. The children in school were asked about other things they did in their own time. {Football Rally-co Horse riding { Swimming Fishing Dancing { Computers Cricket Cycling
Collections of stamps,key rings, football cards,etc. Small games,jigsaw puzzles,etc.
